name: Sled Season
description:
Sled Season was made as part of a 48 hour solo game jam in Dec. 2019. Inspired by the classic sled racing minigame in Club Penguin! There are 3 levels and 2 unlockable sled skins. The goal is to collect all the presents in the least amount of time. Hitting into any obstacles will send you back to the top of the hill; single descent runs are possible for all 3 levels!

A/D or arrow keys to move left & right.
